page.syntax: Selected_List as C = ui_get_list3(C title ,C default_selection ,C choices )

argument.name: Selected_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of user selections.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: choices
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of choices

page.description: Displays a listbox-checkbox. User can select multiple items. Items are returned in the same order in which they are selected.
page.discussion: The UI_GET_LIST3() function displays a check box - list box that allows the user to make multiple selections.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim choices as C choices = <<%a% one two three four five %a% ? ui_get_list3("Select One or More Choices", "three", choices) = three four
